thread.title: Here’s What Saif Ali Khan Said When Kareena Kapoor Asked Him About His WhatsApp DP
thread.title_full: Here’s What Saif Ali Khan Said When Kareena Kapoor Asked Him About His WhatsApp DP

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Here’s What Saif Ali Khan Said When Kareena Kapoor Asked Him About His WhatsApp DP
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 15 . 2017 Saif Ali Khan & Kareena Kapoor Khan 
Earlier this week, Taimur Ali Khan Pataudi broke the internet when Saif Ali Khan put up his photo as his WhatsApp DP and it got circulated in the media. I have to say mommy Kareena Kapoor Khan was every bit right when she said her son was the most gorgeous man – because just look at this ball of cuteness: A post shared by Kareena Kapoor Khan FC (@kareenakapoorteam) on Feb 12, 2017 at 8:06am PST 
According to a report in Pinkvilla , Bebo asked Saif about putting baby Taimur’s photo as his WhatsApp DP, to which Saif replied it’s okay as he could not have hidden it for his whole life. She said: 
I asked Saif why did he put Taimur’s pic on Whatsapp? He was like, “It is okay. I cannot hide him for the whole life.” 
Such cool parents!
